review_content:
Clear golden with a moderate but lasting white head. Good lacing.
Aroma: Dominated by hops: Citrus, grapefruit - also a hint of tropical fruits, passion fruit.
Mouth: Some bitterness but not overwhelming, dry but also with a slight sweet fruity touch. Nice smoooth texture. Medium body.

Bought in August 2021 at Lenta, Izhevsk. 0.33L tin can, best before 12/21.

Pale golden, slightly hazy, medium carbonation with white head. Aroma is fruity and zesty, but at very first somehow unpleasant (synthetic or chemical). However, taste is great, full-bodied, bitter and sweet, with strong notes of tropical fruits and bready malt at the same time. Very good and long aftertaste.

Good beer, refreshing and tasty.

Aromat słodki, klasyczny jeżeli chodzi o IPA: kwiaty, żywica, cytrusy, tropiki (głównie ananas), lawenda, nuty chlebowe, tostowe.
Smak słodki, tropikalny, chlebowy, cytrusowy.
Pełnia średnia, nagazowanie średnioniskie, goryczka średnia.

Pint from cask, 5.2% abv version. Aroma: Medium floral and citrusy hops, bready malts, zesty, maybe some tropical fruit. Appearance: Golden, mostly clear beer with very slight haze. Highly carbonated, with medium foamy head. Taste: Primarily hoppy, slight sweetness, citrus zest, some bready malt. Medium bitterness, low sweetness, average malt. Bitter aftertaste. Balanced IPA. Mouthfeel: Light to medium bodied, fairly high carbonation with plenty of fizz on the tongue, goes down smooth despite it. Overall: Nice standard IPA, well balanced with average bitterness for the style that complements most spicy or citrusy dishes. Not my favourite IPA, but would opt for it as the only one on draft.

Bon, mon avis est assez biaisé, vu que c'est la bière qui m'a fait découvrir le style IPA que j'aime tant. On a donc une bière bien houblonnée, portée sur les agrumes et les fruits tropicaux, avec quelques notes herbacées. Très belle amertume qui reste longuement en bouche. Une référence, tout simplement !

Dorada casi con tono rojizo, no es clara pero tampoco tan turbia, espuma gruesa, bastante aromática, cítrico, frutas, Maracuya, mango, amarga, no tan carbonatada, un poco seca, cuerpo medio bajo, muy rica

Found out of bottle from Auchan in Bielsko-Biala, Poland. Pours a clear gold with heavy white foam.  Great hoppy aroma. Seemingly a nice blend of multiple hop varieties. Delicious hoppy flavor. Great option for any season.

Mon IPA préférée...de loin
L amertume se mêle aux touches citronnees et un retour de fruit de la passion. Exquis vraiment !

Can to a shaker glass. Cloudy gold with a small white head. Aroma is grass, pine, orange. Initial taste is pine, citrus. Fades to the same. Smooth medium body and just enough carbonation. Not bad at all!

Mousse blanche peu fournie, carbonatation presque inexistante. Nez frais herbacé et citronné. En bouche amertume bien présente et confirmation du goût herbacé, légère perception du fruit de la passion.Finale sèche.

Pours a dark straw with deep retentive head over joyous texture. On top it's mango, pineapple, passion fruit and a resinous background. First sip pushes the dry hoppiness forward with a bitter woody flavor and a splash of citrus peel. Tropical notes tend to fade away and come back. The body is light, dry and sharp, with a medium/high carbonation. Finish is bitter and quick with a sweetish hoppy aftertaste that echoes for a while.
Ocena tylko poglądowa, wystawiona na podstawie ogólnych wrażeń, bez szczegółowych notatek.

33cl bottle from store, drinking it at home on 16/06/2021 BB 18/04/22 Pours almost clear golden with some thin white foam on top and good lacing. Nice citrusy, hoppy and fruity - tropical fruit aroma, a bit of light malt and caramel. Taste is really fresh and quite sweet, extremely drinkable with malt, tropical fruit, citrus, lots of hops, slightly piney, lemon and grapefruit. Moderate bitter, slightly dry finish. Light body and very easy to drink, moderate carbonation. Delicious IPA and so drinkable!
Can thanks to RTV: Drank from the can. Aroma is hoppy and fruity, very aromatic. Taste is light bitter, hoppy, fruity, citrus.

Pours an orange gold with a white head. Good malt flavour and a wonderful spicy hop taste. Hints of mango, but the dominant flavour is an earthy bitterness. A very pleasant, well- made West-coast style IPA.
Clear golden with a moderate but lasting white head. Good lacing. Aroma: Dominated by hops: Citrus, grapefruit - also a hint of tropical fruits, passion fruit.…
Bought in August 2021 at Lenta, Izhevsk. 0.33L tin can, best before 12/21. Pale golden, slightly hazy, medium carbonation with white head. Aroma is fruity and…
Aromat słodki, klasyczny jeżeli chodzi o IPA: kwiaty, żywica, cytrusy, tropiki (głównie ananas), lawenda, nuty chlebowe, tostowe. Smak słodki, tropikalny, chlebowy, cytrusowy.…

Pint from cask, 5.2% abv version. Aroma: Medium floral and citrusy hops, bready malts, zesty, maybe some tropical fruit. Appearance: Golden, mostly clear beer with very slight haze. Highly carbonated, with medium foamy head. Taste: Primarily hoppy, slight…

Bon, mon avis est assez biaisé, vu que c'est la bière qui m'a fait découvrir le style IPA que j'aime tant. On a donc une bière bien houblonnée, portée sur les agrumes et les fruits tropicaux, avec quelques notes herbacées. Très belle amertume qui reste…

Dorada casi con tono rojizo, no es clara pero tampoco tan turbia, espuma gruesa, bastante aromática, cítrico, frutas, Maracuya, mango, amarga, no tan carbonatada, un poco seca, cuerpo medio bajo, muy rica

Found out of bottle from Auchan in Bielsko-Biala, Poland. Pours a clear gold with heavy white foam.  Great hoppy aroma. Seemingly a nice blend of multiple hop varieties. Delicious hoppy flavor. Great option for any season.

Mon IPA préférée...de loin
L amertume se mêle aux touches citronnees et un retour de fruit de la passion. Exquis vraiment !

Can to a shaker glass. Cloudy gold with a small white head. Aroma is grass, pine, orange. Initial taste is pine, citrus. Fades to the same. Smooth medium body and just enough carbonation. Not bad at all!

Mousse blanche peu fournie, carbonatation presque inexistante. Nez frais herbacé et citronné. En bouche amertume bien présente et confirmation du goût herbacé, légère perception du fruit de la passion.Finale sèche.

Pours a dark straw with deep retentive head over joyous texture. On top it's mango, pineapple, passion fruit and a resinous background. First sip pushes the dry hoppiness forward with a bitter woody flavor and a splash of citrus peel. Tropical notes tend to…
Ocena tylko poglądowa, wystawiona na podstawie ogólnych wrażeń, bez szczegółowych notatek.

33cl bottle from store, drinking it at home on 16/06/2021 BB 18/04/22 Pours almost clear golden with some thin white foam on top and good lacing. Nice citrusy, hoppy and fruity - tropical fruit aroma, a bit of light malt and caramel. Taste is really fresh and…
Can thanks to RTV: Drank from the can. Aroma is hoppy and fruity, very aromatic. Taste is light bitter, hoppy, fruity, citrus.

Pours an orange gold with a white head. Good malt flavour and a wonderful spicy hop taste. Hints of mango, but the dominant flavour is an earthy bitterness. A very pleasant, well- made West-coast style IPA.
Can’t believe I’ve not rated this. Burnt caramel and bitter citrus. The benchmark for a west coast style ipa

Una ipa molto particolare, ha delle note tropicali molto evidenti, cristallina e limpida e una buona carbonazione, il sapore predominante è il fruttato e le noti dolci con l'amarezza moderata in secondo piano.

Złote, zamglone piwo o obfitej pianie, która zdobi szkło i pozostaje do końca w formie warstewki na powierzchni. Aromat i smak owoców tropikalnych, ale zbyt mało intensywny. Goryczka średnia. Ogólnie fajne orzeźwiające piwo, ale zbyt mało intensywne jak dla mnie.

In der Optik glänzend trüb und goldgelb. Die weiße, mittelporige Schaumkrone gibt sich sehr stabil und auch sehr gut haltbar.
Angenehm exotisch-fruchtiger Duft, der an Ananas, Grapefruit, Maracuja, Pfirsich und Weintraube erinnert.
Der Antrunk kommt frisch, weich-spritzig und leicht karamellig. Im Mittelteil präsentiert sich ein sehr fruchtiger und akkurat vollmundiger Körper mit Aromen von Mango, Grapefruit, Maracuja, Traube, einer leichten Muskatnote und einer angenehm passenden herben Hopfennote. Absolut angenehm und überaus gut süffig, ohne dabei zu herb zu wirken.
Im Abgang spielen die fruchtigen Aromen des Mittelteils nochmal sehr gut zusammen und gehen langsam in ein leicht würzig-muskatiges und angenehmes herbes Hopfenaroma über.
Ein sehr interessantes, wunderbar aromatisches und überaus harmonisches und charaktervolles IPA.

Aroma intenso a mango, fresco, burbuja pequeña y poco persistente
Demasiado amarga...

Can. 5.4% ABV. Clear gold, white head. Herbal hops, light malts.
Dry, prominent bitterness.
A decent, classic IPA. Not too exciting.
Pours clear yellow. White head. Fresh, full flavour natural beer and a classic IPA with is malty, pine, lemon peel, straw. Good carbonation.

Bardzo solidne, przyjemne owoce tropikalne w aromacie i smaku (ananas, marakuja, trochę grejpfrut na finiszu). Nie za dużo ciała i finisz dość delikatny, piwo raczej z gatunku lekkich i pijalnych IPA, ale dobre.

Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień w celu uzupełnienia profilu na RateBeer. Degustacja odbyła się jakiś czas temu.
Instagram/czgr_

Date : 24/04/2021, 
Format : bouteille 330ml. 

Couleurs : mousse blanche, légère. 
La bière est blonde aux reflets ambrés - hazy. 
Nez : pas mal de fruits, agrumes, légèrement maltée. 
Bouche : agrumes et des notes de pin. 
Texture : haute carbo. 
Finale : une belle amertume et de la fraîcheur !

330 ml bottle from a Japanese supermarket; it says 5.4% ABV though. Pours a hazy amber-orange with a two finger head that dissipated quickly; aroma of generous amounts of passionfruit, mango and lemon. Taste is medium sweet but complemented by sufficiently resinous hops - quite balanced. Body and carbonation were medium. No wonder it's rated so highly.

Pours clear yellow. White head. Nose is hay and hops. 
Taste is malty, pine, lemon peel, straw.
Good carbonation. K
Liquide doré transparent avec mousse moyenne. Nez légèrement résineux et malté. En bouche, c'est assez univoque sur le résineux amer. Correct !!!
Klasyczny cytrusowy aromat. W smaku również cytrusowe, lekko miodowe, świeże, z dość mocnym wysyceniem. Fajna klasyka. DOść oleista struktura. Goryczka średnia minus.

330 ml bottle. Had this years ago when it was stronger ABV and one of the few IPA in convenience stores, it had a decent citrus flavour and malt background with a boozy finish. Used to love having a few cans of this after work in the summer instead of a lager. Now trying this new weaker version for the first time..Pours golden with moderate white head. Carbonated. Minimal aroma. Taste weak citrus hop, watery grapefruit, with a  cardboard and weak malt finish. Very unenjoyable especially when you have had the original. They really ruined this beer to reduce costs and reduced the ABV get a lower tax, along with most of their old beers like Elvis Juice. Brewdog have long lost their way. Not surprising therefore that they are now often on reduction in English supermarkets.
Lata. Golden colour, small white head. Nice pine citrus fruity hoppy aroma. Good palate. The flavour is dry and pleasantly fruity hoppy with pine, citrus, some sweetness. Dry bitter hoppy finish.
Fin lys farve med en let duft af citrus. Fin og let bitterhed. God afslutning.
En simpel IPA, en god syre, en god slat humle. Medium carbonation, slick metallic feel, lettere bitter finish
Un peu trop punk pour moi sans doute, un peu trop rêche et amère à mon palais.

The first Brewdog is dedicated to Punk IPA.
The standard British IPA. If the American IPA is a wild Harley motorcycle, this one is a British gentleman with a stuffy heart, elegant and easy-going on the surface, but restless and fanatical in the heart

The aroma doesn't explode like an American IPA, but it doesn't go out in a hurry
The mouth is not full of the ups and downs of the American IPA, it is not full of bitterness and aroma, but it is also full of aroma

If the American IPA is the bitter flavor of pomelo and citrus peel, this is the more acceptable flavor of pineapple and orange flesh

Bottle 33 cl, poured into a trappist glass. Pours a slightly hazy golden with a medium white head and an aroma of floral hops, fresh berries, mango, sweet malts and pine. The taste is medium sweet, with a medium body and a long bitter finish

How: bottle. BB: 18/08/21
Head: two finger, white.
Colour: golden, a bit hazy.
Aroma: ripe citrus fruits, caramel, tropical fruits, slight pine.
Taste: thin to medium body, average carbonation, ripe citrus fruits, pine, resin, slight tropical fruits, 
Citrus fruits in medium long aftertaste.
Well balanced.

Berlin Version, 5.4%. Super clear golden amber with a small head. Nose is very floral, hibiscus and elderflower, a bit dank and tropical. Flavor is a huge funk punk bite of mixed tropifruit, pine, weed, with a hint of floweriness. Nice body from the caramalz content. It's not as bitter as higher proof IPA's which I actually like. Modern classic!
Dejlig, frugtrig IPA - perfekt med syre uden at blive for bitter! En af de bedre af sin slags!
Une valeur sûre pour l’ipa. Nez développé sur les fruits tropicaux. Amertume prononcée avec une fin sèche.
Enjoyed on 20.7.20 at Brewdog bar in Birmingham.  Bit stronger than their traditional one, with a fruity taste and bitter finish.
Citrusy, hoppy aroma with a smooth mango flavor and a bitter finish. Not bad, but overrated.
eau quotidienne, actuellement baissé à 5.4%  bien meilleure en canette qu'en bouteille.

Solo leggermente torbida color paglia e con schiuma persistente. Subito un profumo di agrumi e fiori colpisce l'olfatto per poi dare conferma al gusto. Ottimo equilibrio tra dolce e amaro con i suoi 5.4 gradi ne fa una birra fresca e molto piacevole. Pronti x una seconda!
Pour moi c'est ma référence IPA, avec son parfum et son goût fruité agrume, légère on en reprend facilement une seconde.
Dark golden pour. Tropical fruit aromas alongside some slight funkiness. Taste is strongly tropical fruit with a hint of floral flavors and a fairly bitter finish.
The original and what got me started. Soft spot for the God Father of IPA. Easy drinking, refreshing and light.
At can (0,5l) it has 5,4% alcohol. Tropical fruits, citrus, a medium bitter finish

Overrated
Nothing wrong with it, but given all the hype, it's underwhelming.   I think the overly high ratings must have been given by shareholders.
Nice smell, very very big load of citruses, lack of thick spume but good taste, high price.

Litt overlagret? En mnd. over BF-dato. Litt slappere enn jeg husket den, men for all del - godt! 
Helt greit jomfruøl på RB... 😂
Typical of the style. It's got the citrus, the tropical fruits the hazy body, light hop and grain flavour.  As a trend setter it now feels just a little tame....
Clear medium gold with a rocky white head. Medium bitter, light sweet and tart. Aroma is mostly hops, tropical fruit. Well balanced and easy drinking. Simple yet sophisticated.
De barril espuma guay no huele mucho. A veces me sabe a cítricos a veces a queso. Esperaba más
Un dedo de espuma de retención media. Cuerpo ligero y carbonatación media. Aroma cítrico y lupulado. En boca es refrescante, con notas afrutadas.

As stated in the bottle a postmodern classic. Cannot remember how it has changed over the years but I remember this to be one of the first IPA beers that I have tasted and this has been a staple for over ten years when I want some nice acidic tasty and light beer.

A light ipa,pours golden ,hints of caramel and citrus, grapefruit,pineapple and lychee easy to detect on the tongue,its a thirst quenching brew ,love this ipa with a beef burger meal,available in lots of pubs in Liverpool but served in absolutely pristine condition in Brewdog Bar Liverpool, a great ipa

Can @ home. Pours deep gold with a small white head. Nose is hoppy/fruity with orange, grapefruit and ripe white fruits (peach over all) aromas.
Flavor is very balanced: crisp malt in the opening, a fruity body adding some pineapple in the mix, and a light hoppy finish not so long.
Light body. Thirst-quenching.
De color brillant i aromes intensos a cítrics i préssec. El pas per boca és molt refrescant i lleugerament amarg. Una cervesa molt agradable i que deixa un gust que fa difícil de parar! 😅

Brewdog Advent Calendar Day 1

This Brewdog's flagship never fails to deliver. Significantly hopped and yet refreshingly sessionable.
Decent, nice and refreshing. I expected a little bit more. Please do it more crafty!

From the 2020 brewdog advent calendar. Was 5.4% not the 5.6% I was expecting. 330ml can. Lovely hop aroma , lingering hop aftertaste. Citrus, malt, very nice. 
Earlier Rating: 2/11/2017 Total Score: 3.9
33cl can from a beer hawk mystery case. Brewed in Scotland. Pours golden with a thin head. Medium hoppy IPA. Great fresh hop aroma. Very quaffable. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Full real ipa spot-on flavor, rich mouth feel and aftertaste, medium body, very interesting, doesn't bore

Il profumo è fruttato, il colore è giallo dorato trasparente con una schiuma spumosa. Il gusto è dominato dai luppoli che donano freschezza e sentori di frutti esotici con un finale leggermente amaro. Il corpo è medio, ottima IPA.

Medium, unbalanced nuances of tropical slightly overaged, artificial fruits. Some light malts. Averagely hopped with unclear hop profile. Light/medium body with medium carbonation. Overall, lo-fi and messed up: something wrong with the lines? 3 2 3 3 7

Haven’t rated this before, not sure why. Drunk hundreds of these over the years which means it must be ok although nowhere near my favourite IPA. Pineapple, pine etc Better than most readily available IPAs in pubs and a cheap can. Solid.
Bière trouvée chez Intermarché. Nez parfumé, mousse présente, une bouche bien portée sur les agrumes, une bière pas trop forte et très agréable à boire. Un must have dans sa cave !
330ml can. Fruity aroma and taste. Definitely got a bitter finish. Had to remind myself that it came from a can!
can @ intespar (budapest) golden orange colour, normal body, average carbonated, white head, hoppy, malty, bittersweet, citrus, dry, fresh, easy to drink
Orange hazy, small white head. Citrus and jaffa cake, great balanced bitterness and sweetness.

350 ml bottle. Pour amber color with white foam. Nice hoppy aroma of citrus and pine resin. The taste is dry, subtle, but just as fruity. Bitterness from medium to strong, pleasant, medium saturation.
Nice hoppy beer and pleasant taste although I thought it was a bit pricey. Worth a try though.
12 ounce can.  Pours a slightly hazy gold with a decent white head.  Aroma of citrus and pine.  Taste is grapefruit, orange, pine, floral, and malt.  Pretty good.

Canned. Appearance - pours light Amber, a bit cloudy and lightly carbonated. Smell, grapefruit is dominant, orange peel, passion fruit.
Body - mouthfeel for me is thin. Taste is initially citrus, fruity that gives way to a grapefruit juice type bitterness.
Great session IPA with  a kick, great for a session, light tasting but hoppy.
Clear and golden, strong soapy smell and taste (usually get that from IPAs). Interesting but not my thing.

#350
330ml
Očekivano vrlo dobro... aroma vrlo ugodna (tropsko voće), prstenasta pjena, boja lijepa zlatna... okus izrazito gorak, pun i pitak s obzirom na gorčinu...
Jako dobro pivo, dostojno malom jubileju.

"BrewDog Punk IPA", 5,6 %, Fläschchen aus einem Berliner Supermarkt. - Helles Goldbraun, milchig trüb. - In der Nase schlanke, knackig bittere Pampelmuse und nur dezente Züge tropischer Frucht über fein karamelligem Malz. - Antrunk knackig scharf zitrusfruchtig, viel bittere Pampelmuse, trocken hopfenherb und sehr schlank malzig. Milder rezent. Im Abgang wuchtige harzige Herbe. - Asketisches, auf schlanke zitrusfruchtige Bittere reduziertes IPA ohne reichere fruchtige Aromen. Für meinen Geschmack zu streng und zu schmalspurig. (4.9.2020.)
Súper Clàssica! Aromes cítrics, gust resinos, préssec... Puntet d amargor just. Super refrescant, per no parar😋

Slightly hazy pale gold with a frothy white head, and a feint bitter hop aroma. This was one of the first 'craft' beers I tried back in the day, and then it was nectar - not so much now, but still a decent bitter-hopped pale ale, with a background of biscuit malt and some fruit character

12 oz can from Total Wine and More in Short Pump, VA  The ale poured a clear color with a white foamy head and ample lacing.  An attractive beer.  Nice hoppy aroma of citrus and pine resin was detected.  Some floral hoppy notes greet you as well. This is an easy to drink IPA in the hot summer days with an ABV below 6%. The ale has a medium body and average carbonation.
A nice hoppy beer with fruit flavours. Worth trying as it's a good easy beer to drink in the hoppy world :)

Piwo jasno złote z białą pianą, idealnie klarowne. Z wyglądu przypomina euro lagera. W aromacie na szczęęcie szybko to skojarzenie znika. Spora ilości żywiczno-cytrusowych chmieli wraz z delikatną nutą jasnego słodu. W smaku wytrawne, chmielowe z wyraźną ziołowo-żywiczną goryczką

The lable mentions "the beer that started it all".
I love IPA but I do not understand the hig rates of this beer. Ican taste that the beer has a signature as there is a resemblance with Nanny state and Elvis Juice. It's probably not my signature as for me the beer is not bright enough
Olor exquisitos, cítricos a pomelo, color dorado claro, mediana espuma, poca carbonatacion, ligera , sabor cítricos poco amargor, final medio y seco, es una cerveza nada del otro mundo, refrescante.
Boca 0,33L - kupljena u Kauflandu - OK IPA, osobno ništa posebno pogotovo u usporedbi s našim domaćim ipama
Приятный вкус, долгое послевкусие, отличный баланс хмелевой горечи и свежего фруктово-цитрусового послевкусия, напоминающего выпечку

The canned version brings a pleasant, hopy IPA scent after opening and pouring, and after tasting, the enjoyable carbonation pushes the delicate slightly bitter-fruity taste into one's head! The Scottish guys know something! One of my favorite IPAs!
Hiya!

Data do 28.02.2021. Wygląd: barwa złota, lekko zamglona, piana niezbyt obfita, średnio-pęcherzykowa. Aromat: żywica, wyraźne grejpfruty, lekko cytrusy, iglaki, leciutko słodowe. W smaku bardzo wytrawne, dużo iglaków i żywicy. Goryczka umiarkowana, delikatnie , zalega, grejpfrutowa. Wysycenie umiarkowane, ciało smukłe. 

No całkiem okej weast coastcik.
Nice citrus aroma. Balanced taste, some bitterness. Dry finish,light bitterness. Nice and very drinkable.

@home. Look: Pours clear color like apple juice. Medium white head, quite quick halfed. Nose: Piny hops, gummy bears. Taste: Fresh with a medium balanced bitterness, a little lingering bitterness in the after. Overall: Not a very memorable IPA, but clean and drinkable.

non è la punk ipa di una volta. Color tra oro e ambra. Schiuma persistente. 

Al naso abbastanza agrumata (polmelmo, anguria, melone, arancia). In bocca il tutto è davvero deludente. Moderatamente amara. Ben bilanciata. DIssetante. In bocca è agrumanta ma si sente circa il 30/35 % di ciò che si sente al naso.
Классичнское ипа. Чистое. Ароматное и слегка горькое. Прозрачное и чистое во вкусе. подойдет для любого потребителя.

0.33l can from Lidl. Golden colour, clean body. Off-white head, not very big, not very persistent. Typical fruity aroma (grapes, mandarin) bit of pine. Not very complex but pleasant. Taste is fruity, again with grapes and some honey. Moderately bitter aftertaste with a hint of yeast. Light, even watery mouthfeel, moderate carbonation, bit fizzy. Easy to drink IPA, more on the session side, well composed, pleasant but not very complex and not very intensive.
Pours a golden colour with a big frothy white head. Smells of citrus, grapefruit and peach. Taste of a bitter pithy fruit with smooth after notes of coffee

330ml can, BBE May 2021. Bought in Asda, 2 x 4 packs of ‘craft’ beers for £9 is good value. Pours gold with a slight haze. Hoppy, citrus, lime, grapefruit aroma, very nice. A little watery on the palate but nice carbonation. Taste is quite hoppy, soft malts, with mild citrus fruits and a nice long bitter aftertaste. Very nice indeed and easy to drink so I can see why it was/is popular particularly if new to the American IPA style.
Pours a relatively clear gold colour. 1 finger white head. Faint stone fruit on the nose. Light carbonation. Slightly bitter finish. There are way better pale ales out there.
Sehr fruchtig im anttrunk. Es kommen litschi und Ananas sehr stark zu Geltung. Auch bisschen Grapefruit ich mit dabei. Im Abgang aggressiv bitter
Very fruity IPA. Peach, tangerine, grapefruit. Just lovely. Drinkability is super high.
Ottima ipa molto frasca e ben luppolata, ottima tenuta di schiuma bianca, bollicina media, colore giallo opaco, bellissimo corpo. Nel complesso una birra molto bevibile ben bilanciata con luppolo
Fruity flavors with a bitter finish. Somewhat dull flavors.  Not very exciting beer as far as I am concerned.  I like more exciting flavors. Still not terrible.
Hops with a touch of pineapple on the nose. Bloody lovely fruity hoppy palate. Great IPA.
A very decent classic. Has a great fruity and grassy aroma. Tastes like peach ice tea which is great

33 cl bottle. It has hazy medium amber color (SRM 12/13) , short foam on top, strong mango  smells on nose, great citrus aromas with strong bitterness at the end. My expectaons  were much more than i found.
Goudgeel helder bier, met witte schuimkraag die snel weg zakt. Fruitig, (citrus)hoppig. Vleugje caramel waarneembaar. Beetje waterig en droog op de tong.
Clear and golden when poured, strong soapy smell and taste (I usually get that from IPAs but try again from time to time). Interesting but not my thing.
Decent mass produced IPA with a touch of hops but not a dominant aroma or flavour. an ipa I'd drink as a session beer.
De las mejores IPAs del mercado en calidad-precio, sabor intenso pero sin llegar a cansar. Fresca, aromática y lupulada con matices en boca tanto a la entrada como al terminar.

Pours a light orange tinted gold with a loose white head which disappears quickly.......aroma of fruity, pine, malt sweetness, citrus.......taste is a bit hollow early, light body, citrus, slight bitterness......this must just barely make the IPA guidelines as it's quite short on everything.
Ипа которое хочется пить и пить. Легкое. Ароматное и понятное. Горечь умеренная.

# 1975; 4/2020. Aroma of tropical fruits, citrus. Hazy gold body, white head. Fruity, grapefruits, tropical fruits, zesty, long and strongly bitter finish. Excellent IPA. 0,33 l, bottle, supermarket, Pilsen (Bohemia, CZ).
Great ipa, probably the best mass produced one. Some nice citrus notes, pleasant hoppy finish. Medium carbonation.

Pours an orange coloured beer with a white thin head 
Notes of citrus fruits and berries fruits fresh fruits and berries
Fruity aroma and tropical fruit taste. Very nice ipa beer and easy drinking. Though i prefer my beer to have an higher abv. Great beer though.
Décidément une bière de qualité qui a tout pour elle. Une vrai réussite et une belle découverte.

Dark blonde and not much foam, but quite tight and creamy.

Nose: soapy, floral, hops, sweet malt, banana, lime acid, 

Creamy, tart, Light hops, malt, pie, short finish? No, the finish is the palate
Very fruity aroma. Hints of passion fruit in the aroma and taste. A remind of bitter marmalade. A bitter finish but lovely.

The best incredible beer I’ve ever drunk!!
Quite bitter taste with lots of good quality hop and little bit fruity.
Citrus, resin, juicy hop with mild bitterness and low sweetness. Not bad but not good either.

Weird that I never earlier seemed to have rated this classical postmodern IPA. Looks beautiful: sparkling clear golden with white head; only retention might have been better. Aroma is hoppy, fruity, orange/grapefruit, tropical. Taste accordingly: medium bitter, lasting in the aftertaste. OK carbo. There are many good IPA's nowadays, among which far more soecific or characteristic than Punk, but it still is this fundamental classical postmodern IPA indeed...

On tap at Rent Mel Bakeri of Pizzeria in Oslo, Norway. 

Clear (although not perfectly) orange with a small off-white head and very good lacing.  

Aroma of mango, orange, pineapple and other tropical fruit. 

Taste of tropical fruit, orange and pineapple. 

Medium body and medium carbonation.

Aroma : Moderate grapefruity citrus, a touch of pine resin, no appreciable maltiness.  Taste : Thin & watery, mellow bitterness throughout, short lightly dry finish. Not nasty just very boring. More like an insipid APA. Can't understand how the average rating for this is so high!
0,33l bottle parnassos- pale orange color with a vanishing white head - fruity aromas - bit of a watery taste but good palate and bitter finish
Clear golden appearance. Aroma is full of citrus and hops. Clean, crisp, citrus taste. Fantastic.
Cerveza aromática frutal finales amargas que hacen que su contraste sea un complemento perfecto

0,33 bottle. Kristálytiszta és világos arany színű, ami IPA-tól szokatlan. Habja fehér, átlagos. Illata kicsit szokatlan. Élesztőt is érezni a komlók mellett és még malátát is. Egyébként gyantás, gyógyfüves illat. Ízre nagyon jól hozza a stílus keserűségét. Közepesen testes, megfelelően komlós. Hab viszonylag szépen tart. Jó kis komplex IPA, jó utóízekkel, talán piti lehetne testesebb. Gyógyszeres, gyógyfüves keserű utóíz. Nem rossz.
***It is crystal clear and light gold in color, which is unusual from IPA. Its foam is white, average. The smell is a bit unusual. You can also feel yeast next to hops and even malt. Otherwise resinous, herbal scent. It brings the bitterness of style very well to the taste. Medium-bodied, properly hops. Foam holds relatively nicely. Good little complex IPA, with good aftertaste, maybe piti could be more full-bodied. Medicinal, herbal bitter aftertaste. Not bad.
Yellow with a frothy white head. Malt sweetened pineapple, light slick. Tropical fruits a bit watery and medium bitter.
Aroma of malt, dusty, grapefruit, wilted hops. Slightly toasted malt flavor, resinous hops, medium bitterness. Medium-high carbonation, medium body.
De momento, la mejor IPA que he probado. Aromática y con un amargor propio de las IPA correcto.

This is a backlog rating from 2013 from a bottle, from notes. When I had this beer it was average to below average for the style and not something I wanted to have again or I just didn't get back to my notes because of my technology at the time, work and/or family. Words to describe this beer are pale malts, grapefruit citrus, resin, one of the many.
Glas gedronken van de tap in Utrecht na beursbezoek samen met Tomhendriksen. Goudgeel helder bier met matig schuim. Aroma en smaak is erg hoppig en harsig. Nasmaak is bitter.
Geprobeerd met Inoven van tap, in Utrecht. Het is een goudgeel bier met een volle witte schuimkraag. Het heeft een harsige en hoppige geur. De smaak is bitter, harsig en hoppig.

Nice IPA with long lasting taste.
Tasted this beer. Drinkable to Pink Floyd, Elbow and other great bands. Remember to enjoy your beer in company with good friends.

330ml can, served in 12oz schooner. Slightly hazy pale yellow beer, with a fast collapsing white head. I am amazed I have not rated this beer before as it has been around for so long. Stereotype 'craft' beer, ie 5.6abv hoppy American style IPA. Don't get me wrong, a very pleasant beer to drink, and in many places the best option, but has become to this style of beer what leffe blond is to Belgian Abbey ales.

12 ounce can from Woodman's Oak Creek, 1/6/20. Clear amber, large foamy tan head, good retention. Aroma of pretentiousness and assholery with notes of plastic, grapefruit, pale malt. Mild aroma. Taste is lime, lemon, melon, pale malt. Thin. Kinda weak and tame. And lame, like the brewery. Meh.

Golden hazy with a thin head.
Very agreaeable fruity smell of mango and a note of orange peels. In taste a satisfiying grainy, malty attack, then the fruity bitterness unfolds. Medium carbonation.
The greatest plus of this beer is its rich body, a pleasure to drink such a liquid.

Yeah i know it's Brewdog, But i have to say that so far this is the best IPA i have tried, It just beats St Austell proper job by a minute smidge! You will not be dissapointed, i wish Drunkenvasey would do a review!!

On tap at Bieradies.  It poured a golden color with a white head.  The aroma was of hops, citrus and florals.  The taste was similar to the aroma with more hops, citrus, florals, tropical fruits, grass with medium carbonation and a nice semi bitter aftertaste.

Canette 355ml. Couleur orangée voilée, mousse beige pâle. Arôme de malt, poussiéreux, pamplemousse, houblon fané. Goût de malt légèrement grillé, houblon résineux, amertume moyenne. Carbonatation moyenne-élevée, corps moyen.
Outstanding. Fruity hops, pineapple, just right bitterness. Must try for every beer lover and the beer that got me into craft
Nem az én ízvilágom. Irritáló mint egy igazi ótvar punk. Sőt még szénsavas is.
Cerveza donde el lúpulo predomina sobre el resto de ingredientes. De color anaranjado. Notas frutales muy intensas.
Drinking Brewdog Punk IPA draught at Soho Koh Phangan. Nice IPA with a hint of pineapple. Seems like the beer is the same from 1st to last pint here.
De couleur jaune opaque,on n’a des notes agrume comme le pamplemousse.en bouche c est Un goût de pamplemousse et le goût est là mais avec moins amertume

American style IPA with loads of citrusy hop flavour and decent bitterness. Also quite a noticeable pineapple flavour which is very refreshing. Well balanced and despite its 5.6% strength would make a tempting session beer. Fairly similar to Lagunitas daytime IPA which is another of my favourites.
Lloc: El Pibe. Amargor la justa, molt de cos i sabor intens. Agradable gust torrat
Light, malty with a pine and grapefruit taste. The pineapple and lychee are a subtle but good touch, and the hop varieties give this some exotic notes. A good IPA!

18.10.2019
AR: hopfig, fruchtig
AP: ziemlich klares goldgelb
TA: hopfig, fruchtig

Pours a hazy amber with a thin, lumpy mashed potato head. Extremely light pineapple aroma. Pineapple with berry taste. More like a flavored ale than an ipa. Hop flavor noticeably missing. Highly carbonated, sharp aftertaste.

We all know a lot of people are riding the hype-coaster with this IPA. Massively overrated for what it is. But it was groundbreaking at the time. Sure, it's lovely. Super clean fresh piney IPA that's has the looks to boot. Lovely bit of haze in the glass. Does the mouthfeel match it? Not quite. A little thin, just. But, enough hop flavour to carry it home. Will I drink it if I see something else... It's an easy go-to beer but there are more exciting things out there now. Very good.

Butelka w Beer's no. 1, Ostrawa. W sumie jak się w miarę świeże kupi, to i całkiem nieźle się prezentuje. Aromat zdecydowanie niezbyt intensywny, jakieś zamglone cytrusy, klimaty słodowe, karmelek. Półwytrawne, dość ciężkie owoce tropikalne, niezbyt dużo ciała, wysoka goryczka. Nic fenomenalnego, ale i tragedii nie ma.
Nice taste and smell, not a really charged color. It is an expensive one but it’s great.
Setting the benchmark for a flavourful, aromatic and extremely drinkable IPA. Perfect for any occasion
Light, malty with a pine and grapefruit taste. The pineapple and lychee are a subtle but good touch, and the hop varieties give this some exotic notes. A good IPA!

Fruktig doft & komplex doft med en djup smak av citrus och deo. 
Ok pris 5,6%

Acheté en bouteille.
Jolie couleur jaune
En bouche fruité, rafraîchissant
Se déguste avec envie
Un gros 👍
J'en rachèterai
Quite good. Sweet smell with some hops but very Light. The same applies to the flavour itself. Light but good beer
Bottle - Pours a clear golden with strong pine and citrus aromas. Nice mouthfeel with grapefruit and bitterness in the finish. Very good.
Uzupełnienie ocen piwnych bez opisu z uwagi na przeniesienie z papierowych zapisków.

For sure i love these "Grapefruit" beers from "BrewDog".. This sour taste is definitely my cup of tea.. 
Before drink this beer that perhaps is the most famous beer from them, i try the "Dead Pony" first and i notice both of them they are similar beers.. The diffirence is off course the alcohol and the carbonation.. "Dead Pony" has "3.8%" alcohol but much more carbonation.. Here the carbonation is more soft and general the entire beer is low profile.. So i find "Dead Pony" much more alive beer despite has less alcohol and that actually is a big benefit.. You can drink as many as you want.. This beer has the same sour "Grapefruit" taste but with less carbonation and that make it little boring in my opinion..
Overall is a decent and great beer but i definitely i choose the similar and punchy "Dead Pony" to drink over this anytime in the future and that is the fact...
Aroma luppolato neipa. Colore ambrato buona schiuma. Gusto un poco piatto per una IPA. Fgp
Les bieres de chez Brewdog ne m'ont jamais déçu ! Très facile à trouver la punk IPA reste ma favorite pour son goût inimitable !

10 year since I first tried this beer, really didn't take to it then or on the couple of other occasions I've tried it. This time a good 5 years on it was much improved, or rather my taste buds have. Now tastes a very good IPA, like so many others out there. It pours a amber colour with a white head. Aromas & tastes of hops, pine, grass & earth. Smooth body with good level of bitter in the aftertaste.
Licht fruitig kruidig met een vaag licht bittere afdronk. Volgens de brouwerij een 'bier met vanzelfsprekende tegenstrijdigheden'.
Golden with a good white head. Smell is typical IPA, hoppy and grassy.It gives a good whole-mouth bitterness with notes of citrus. The back-of-tongue bitterness has the palate here. True to style.
Solid but not sure it is as amazing as the ratings suggest. Not much on the nose, melony pineapple flavours with a grassy bitterness hit. Low to medium malt. Ok.
Lecker erfrischend, Zitrusfrüchte in der Nase. Kein Schwergewicht, exotische Fruchtnoten im Geschmack.

This is a tough one. Somebody is grilling chicken nearby and Aromas are mixing with everything else. But, I'm getting fresh dank Citrus hops with some wet and dry grain. Flavors are similar to nose, citrusy sweet accentuated by crisp carbonation with low bitterness. Good body and finish. Nice beer.

Bottiglia. Al naso arrivano impressioni di luppolo. L'intensità olfattiva è elevata e la maniera in cui permane è apprezzabile. Il mantello birroso superiore resiste abbastanza. La grandezza delle bollicine è medio-fine. Il liquido è di aspetto opalescente. Il colore è ambrato. Il corpo è strutturato. L'amaro è carico. La forza gustativa è elevata e la durata è buona e persistente. Il gusto è piacevole. Le sensazioni boccali finali risultano luppolate. Il finale è amarognolo. Il retrogusto è intenso. L'aroma in bocca porta i segni di miele, frutta secca, luppolo, resina, pino, agrumi, pompelmo e ananas.
Bottle at home. Clear gold white head hoppy lightly fruity malt straw notes

Quite simply the best ale I have ever had the pleasure to drink, on a regular basis.  There are couple of treat beers that are better, but this is my go to regular beer!  Deep taste aroma and character.  Wonderful beer!!
Very hoppy and bitter that put me off at first, but grown to like it overtime. Will never question the punk again.
A true classic, available widely now to the point it’s a bit mainstream maybe but still really good
12oz can.  Citrusy aromas, piney, light tropical.  Clear orange with a mostly lasting white head.  Dry, zesty, nicely balanced.  Medium bodied.

Ein tropischer Duft kommt einem schon beim Einschenken entgegen.
Die goldgelb Flüssigkeit ist leicht trüb (milchig). Während man noch das Aroma von Mango in der  Nase hat setzt sich ein Hauch Grapefruit durch. Fakt ist. Es schmeckt nach Bier und richtig lecker. Leider etwas bitter im Nachgang.

Golden colour with medium white head. Aroma of lychee, grapefruit, herbs. Taste starts lychee sweet over bitter grapefruit and finishes with dry bitterness. Finally grabbed one of these and it is really good.

Al naso malto e frutta, leggeri sentori di melone e ananas. Schiuma biancastra che persiste di un paio di mm per tutta la bevuta. Attacco mediamente amaro, tipo pompelmo. Carbonatazione media, leggerissime note minerali che spariscono a metà bevuta, dove inizia a sentirsi di più il malto e meno l'amaro. Forse l'alcol non è coperto benissimo, un po' lo senti, ma comunque una buona IPA.
Una IPA con sus características típicas de amargor pero con sus toques afrutados. Muy rica.

Given a 16 oz draw at Bjor Gardurinn in Reykjavik, I am happy to try an IPA at the end of a long trip. Semi-clear, basic IPA yellow with a frothy white head. Great carbonation. I take a sniff, hay and citrus. Taste is lemon, a soft hoppiness and a hint of herbs. Yeah, it is okay.
Impressive IPA with easy-drinking qualities. Smooth flavours and very nice on the nose. I would buy it again!

Demasiada suave
Aromas muy marcados y levemente frutales
Pero al momento de probarla no se sintieron dichos tonos

$1.95 can, WW. Clear gold with a soft off-white head. Floral hops, citrus, bready malt in the nose. Flavor is bitter lemon and grapefruit zest, green grasses, almost banana... It's fine, but it doesn't stand out like the ratings indicate it should.
2019.07.27. Легкая, питкая, освежающая IPA. Но на мой взгляд не хватает горечи и аромата, пиво напоминает пилснер.
En riktig favorit god smak och en av få med så mycket smak man kan dricka många av.
Golden, clear, with abundant, thick foam. In Pilsner fragrance, light citrus, grain. Semi-dry, watery, malty citrus, with a solid, tan bitterness in taste
Still a great go to IPA. Looking forward to seeing how the Australian brewed punk tastes
Złote, klarowne, z obfitą, grubą pianą. W zapachu pilzneński, lekki cytrus, zboże. Półwytrawne, wodniste, słodowo cytrusowe, z solidną, garbnikową goryczką w smaku. Ot takie Ipa sprzed 5 lat...
An enjoyable, smooth and slightly bitter IPA. Strong citrus notes yet not too overpowering. A solid session beer.
33 cl can. Smells of grapefruit and orange.  Warm orange color and clear. Nicely balanced. Tastes of citrus with a Light bitterness. Soft and smooth. Nice.
Cask, abv 5.4% label says. Hazy, golden, creamy head. Pine, citrus and mango in aroma, medium body, low medium bitterness. OK.

330ml can. Had many times in bottle, keg and can- finally decided to rate it. One thing of note, which is, perhaps, a little bit surprising, is that it massively varies between the three and time. So this is a review of a can in June 2019. Aroma is fantastic! Lots of piney grapefruit. Its golden with a very slight haze and a thin white head. Its very drinkable and has a mild to medium bitterness, but a slightly thin mouthfeel. Overall, its incredibly drinkable with a subtle grapefruit bitterness, but just very average.

W aromacie cytrusy, melon, lekka słodycz, lekki karmel. Jasne, złote, klarowne. Piana biała, średnia i drobna, średnio-trwała.
Orzeźwiające, chmielowe, goryczka średnia.

Golden Color, Good Clarity, white beer head with thick, frothy, creamy foam, low persistency, non-sparkling body.
Apparently Hoppy characters, such as citrus, passion fruits, herbal, mint, orange. The malt also contributes bread and caramel hints. 
Medium sweetness, medium bitterness, medium body, medium carbonation. The aftertaste is hoppy and bitter but acceptable. The flavor is complex. Although the mainstream is hoppy, the balance between hops and malts is good. The malt provide a backbone to the beer. all in all, this is a impressive beer.

7-11's summer beer campaign is on! 500ml. can. Aroma: a field of pineapples. Appearance: clear amber, pours a generous head, quickly dissipating. Palate: light-bodied and slick, average carbonation, bitter at the finish. Taste: heavily bitter, not my favourite style but nonetheless respectable. Very refreshing in this 38 degree heat...

On keg, wrong moment in a British summer which means it was enthusiastcally over-chilled by teenage bar staff who know nothing except bloody lager. However Punk IPA still retains the major essence we all appreciated from its origin. All preceding reviews are right in their way, critical or not. Brewdog is still an exciting brand - celebrate it while we've got it.
Okay, not really a beer review but we know Brewdog, it doesn't really need reviewing at the moment.
Nice crisp feel. Zingy aroma. Fizzy appearance. Light head. God awful alkaline taste. Soapy finish. Not good drinking.
My favourite from brew dogs collection, a strangely recognisable taste but at the same time definitively unique. Cans are great but I think it’s best experienced in the form of a pint from a tap.
敦厚的香氣及略苦口感，但是非常的迷人。這是一款淺色印度淺色愛爾(IPA)，醇厚口感是必備的，雖然瓶裝版本喝起來無法與新鮮啤酒相比，但整體感覺還是蠻夠水準的。

This beer should not be drunk ice cold: many more aromas appeared as the glass warmed up a little. There was a clear smell of vanilla, tropical fruit a some berry-like aromas. Bitter all along, on the edge, but never over it. A good, but not great IPA.

Decent IPA, more generic than I was expecting, very mid-Oughts in its amorphous pine-citrus bitterness and mild toasted cracker malt notes. Grapefruit, resin, and a touch of passion fruit lead to a clingy, moderately dry fade. Not bad--good with pizza--but nothing life-changing.

On key keg with secondary fermentation so therefore cask. Appearance - golden with neat lacing. Definitely lower carbonation than usual Punk.  Nose - resin and light note of fresh sweat. Grapefruit.  Taste - grapefruit and light resin.  Palate - light to medium bodied with a creamy texture. Dry balanced bitterness on the long finish.  Overall - even more sessionable than regular punk. 
Earlier Rating: 3/4/2011 Total Score: 3.7
Smells like pine-tundra shower gel - very forest floor in nose. Also, big grapefruit going on. Hazy appearance. More grapefruit, pine and a background maltiness which I don’t remember from the original.

Zlote klarowne, w zapachu chmiel, cytrusy, lekka slodycz. W smaku mocno chmielowe, swieze orzezwiajace, cytrusy, pomelo, pomarancza. Dobry balans miedzy swiezoscia delikatnoscia i mocną goryczką. Dobrze nagazowane, goryczkowe i bardzo świeże
Una IPA che ha avvicinato tanti a questo mondo. Amaro persistente ma ma senza astringenza, sentori di frutta ma senza estenuanti note floreali o tropicali.

Color naranja pálido, transparente. Espuma blanca, escasa y efímera. Aroma herbal y cítrico, escasamente tropical. Sabor en esa línea, final de tenue amargor herbal, del que a mí me gusta pero muy ligero. Textura acuosa. Carbonatación media.

Llego muy tarde a probar esta cerveza, todo el mundo me había dicho que ERA un cañonazo pero que ha cambiado mucho, no la probé entonces, ahora es una IPA mediocre.
Nice balance between a traditional IPA bitterness and hopped fruit aroma. Hops are fresh and plenty.

Golden amber color with a fine fine foam.
Nose. Citruses, flower, caramel, some grass.
Taste. Citruses, a little pine, sweet, bitter. Good IPA

Bottle from Morrisons. Quite a beautiful IPA, nice golden colour with very minimal head. The smell is gorgeous and the taste is the right amount of bitterness. The aftertaste is really fruity and on the tounge is quite nice also. Grapefruit taste throughout and goes well with the light passion fruit tones. A top IPA.

Excelente. Muy aromática y refrescante.  La primera sensación es cítrica y frutal. En la boca tiene un toque amargo muy agradable. Una IPA para no olvidar.
Comprada en Alcampo por 1.5€. Botella de 33cl.
My go to beer, find it pretty much everywhere these days. VERY REFRESHING. 5.6 vol.
Klasyka. Dużo białych, soczystych owoców, czysty profil. W aromacie trochę karmelu. Goryczka średnia. Dobra IPA.

Botella de 33 cl.  Color amarillo dorado,  cristalina.  Espuma blanca,  tamaño medio.  Poca retención. 
Aromas florales y herbales,  intensos. También cereal. 
En boca amargor medio-bajo,  suave pero con notas a cereal, pino,  floral.  Muy bebible.

Lovely golden orange colour with a medium foam that lasts duration. very aromatic. Amazing taste of hops and citrus (grapefruit and passion fruit). Smooth with a good finish. In my opinion the best IPA around.
330 ml bottle. Light, aromatic and refreshing. A classic IPA with a little dry finish.

Medium formation foam, medium density and short head persists for quite long.
Pale golden liquid just a little bit cloudy. 
Aroma is amazing. Fruity, hoppy and citric. Notes of passion fruit, yellow citric fruits and a light lemon with a citric low sweetness at the end. Yeasty aroma is notable too.
On mouth, light but with personality. The same aroma notes but lighter and without sweetness. The end of the sip is dry and a little bit more yeasty, with a bitterness that gives a punch but very short.
The aftertaste punches even harden but short as well, with a yeasty dry end, asking for another sip.
A true and classic IPA. Perfectly balanced and carbonated.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Medium formation foam, medium density and short head persists for quite long.
Pale golden liquid just a little bit cloudy. 
Aroma is amazing. Fruity, hoppy and citric. Notes of passion fruit, yellow citric fruits and a light lemon with a citric low sweetness at the end. Yeasty aroma is notable too.
On mouth, light but with personality. The same aroma notes but lighter and without sweetness. The end of the sip is dry and a little bit more yeasty, with a bitterness that gives a punch but very short.
The aftertaste punches even harden but short as well, with a yeasty dry end, asking for another sip.
A true and classic IPA. Perfectly balanced and carbonated.
A very fruity beer which looks perfect with a orange look. It has a foam that keeps standing. A perfect cooling IPA.

I only drank 100ml in Hamburg, and with spicy food, so it seemed very subdued and balanced to me. May 2019 (3.5)

Drank a bottle from 2019 beerwulf advent cal. Well balanced. Great ipa.
Sucre goût d'agrumes très prononcé amertume moins présente au la plus part des ipa, très faible note d'alcool

Klare, goldene Farbe mit weißer Schaumkrone. Blumig hopfiger, fruchtiger Geruch. Geschmacklich hopfig und fruchtig mit Citrus, Grapefruit und Orangen. Leichte bis mittlere Süße mit hoher Bitterkeit, mittlerer Körper mit aktiver Kohlensäure.
Hazy gold color with a big frothy white head. The aroma was tropical citrus with a resinous flavor profile of pineapple and mandarin oranges. The taste is moderately bitter.
Etwas in die Jahre Klassiker, der im Vergleich zu anderen IPAs mittlerweile schwächer wirkt. Zitrusartige Fruchtigkeit, angenehm herb gehopft. Immer noch richtig gut. Nur eben nicht spitze.

Почти нет пены, цвет бледноватый, люблю когда посочнее, про цитрусовые нотки.. ну не знаю, распробовать их можно если ты сверхчеловек, или молодец и не куришь и можешь различать оттенки вкусов и делаешь это очень тонко)..хорошее пиво, но для brewdog как-то незамысловато!
clear, light amber color; crisp, citrusy, grapefruit aroma; smooth, crisp hop flavor with grapefruit notes; very light bodied
Ich denke das Bier war schon eine Weile in der Flasche! Aroma sehr flach, malzig, bitter..
33cl bottle.  Pours slightly hazy copper color. Aroma of floral, peach, tropical fruit. Flavor of pineapple, mango, pine. Really tasty beer.

Wygląd: mętnawe, drobna piana 

Aromat: słodki, owocowy, liczi, 

Smak: białe owoce, owoce tropikalne, umiarkowana gorycz

Ocena: bardzo dobre sesyjne IPA

Refrigerated 12 oz. aluminum can, March 5, 2019 poured into a glass.  Clear golden with medium white head.  Aroma is herbal hops, medium body, lower carbonation, and little lacing.  Taste is herbal hops.
Cerveza con mucho aroma, correcta aunque le falta un poco de armonía, el olor te hace esperar mas de lo que luego es
Bevuta in bottiglia.  Ottima IPA. Non sono un amante del genere ma questa è buona e non troppo amara.

Jasne, zlote, klarowne. Wysoka nietrwała piana, mocno nasycone. W aromacie nafta, cytrusy. W smaku gorzkie. Ale tak nieprzyjemnie, jakby alkoholowo. Goryczka spora, troche chemiczna (jak jakis plyn do naczyn). Na szczescie krotka. Przyjemna nafta w aromacie to jedyna zaleta tego piwa.
Den här är riktigt god, speciellt med tanke på att den är hyfsat billig. Lätt smak av citrus och ingen brödsmak, vilket gör att den känns fräsh/lätt.
Suurepärase maitsebuketiga õlu. Meeldiv humalane lõhn ja samaväõrne maitse.
0,33 l bottle. Very good IPA although I like more than 6% alc vol IPA-s more.

Bière très très sympa dans son genre : plutôt légère en saveur céréalière elle laisse pleinement s'exprimer un houblon joliment fruité, avec une très belle amertume rafraichissante à souhait.

Et facilement trouvable en supermarché (dans les Carrefour près de chez moi en tout cas).

Review: 50cl can of Brewdog Punk IPA: 5.6% vol.

A “post modern classic” as they say on the can, or ” The beer that began a revolution” on the website. Yeah the usual guff from the Brewdog boys. LOL. 

On pour, get a very good frothy white head, and a clear golden coloured beer, looks very decent. Some very good lacing. A nice looking brew. 

The aroma is very good, a typical IPA smell off the beer, very hoppy, fruity and citrusy, caramels, crisp and strong on the nose, but all good. 

Taste is what you would expect from the BrewDog guys, all overloaded with hops, but they are all very manageable and well balanced, and very tasty to boot in this one. 

Get a lot in the can which is always good.

Like this a lot, very tasty, and extremely crisp and relaxing to sip. The tropical fruits are banging, the malts are there and the hops are just killing it. Very easy to drink and enjoy. A perfectly balanced beer. 

Fantastic beer, very good, typical IPA, but no fucking around, no messing, got it just right, just dead on. A perfect example of what an IPA is all about, sets the standard for sure. And topped that standard taste with the tropical fruits to produce a classic. 
Very good. The tropical fruits really add to the flavours and sets it apart from more regular IPA’s

Recommended. So good I could have drank more than the measly two I got, boy did I want to drink more of these……..

Excelente IPA de los escoceses de Brewdog. Color dorado velado con espuma blanca adherente y fina. Lo mejor de esta cerveza, su aroma. Mezcla de lúpulos americanos que le dan ese toque tropical, cítrico, herbal y floral, redondeado con notas d cereal y malta. No me canso de olerla. En boca es equilibrada. Entrada fresca de fruta tropical madura, cítricos, cereal tostado y resinas de lúpulo. Amargor moderado. Cuerpo redondo, textura sedosa y carbonatación media. Para repetir a menudo.

Nie mogłem się doczekać co do tego piwa. Mam nadzieję, że się nie rozczaruję.
Oczy: Kolor złoty, leciutko zamglony. Olbrzymia czapa piany.
Nos: cytrusy, białe owoce (melon, winogrona, jabłka), lekko słód
Paszcza: delikatne ale nie puste, goryczka na poziomie średnim. Wysycenie niskie. Konsystencja oleista. Bardzo fajne piwo. Bardzo pijalne.

It was an okay drink from a pub that didn’t seem interested in good care of bottled ‘craft ales’. The only drawback was that the drink induced a flavour memory of old pickled eggs left atop a traditional English Country pub bar. Unusual but surprisingly palatable.

Arômes de houblons citronnés. Robe dorée, pétillante sans mousse. Attaque sur des houblons citronnés. Longueur en bouche sur du houblon, des herbes et des fruits. Pas si amer pour une IPA. Bien bonne.
Hazy golden color, white head, aroma of hops, citrus, orange peel, flowers and caramel, taste is medium bitter/medium sweet, medium body, medium carbonation, easy to drink.

Can 500ml @ home
Hazy golden to light orange colour with a nice lasting white head. Aroma is malty, with distinctive caramel notes, moderate hoppy with citrus notes, like mandarin, perhaps. Flavour is sweet at first with caramel notes and bitter afterwards, with a long duration. Body is medium, carbonation is soft. Enjoyed every time!

On tap på Humle Ølbar i Næstved. 
Nærmest den perfekte IPA.
Både citrus og tropiske frugter samt en skovlfuld Humle, der er lige tilpas.

Aroma: Hoppy citrus, caramel sweetness, tropical fruits.
Appearance: Light golden amber, clingy white head.
Taste: Pine, hops, grapefruit, bitter, resin.

If you want to introduce someone to the world of hoppy beers without fear of scaring them off with something packed to the rafters with hops & citrus notes, this is the IPA to show them. If I had to describe it in 3 words, they would be flavourful, refreshing, enjoyable.

This one sits bang on the border between easy drinkability and bombastic flamboyance. It can be a beer in the old sense of the term, playing second fiddle to conversation. But it can also be a modern, connoisseur brew - the *topic* of conversation. That bandwidth, rather than any particular characteristic or nuance, is what continues to make Punk IPA very special.

( on tap)
Aroma: citrus fruits, pine and malt.
Taste: semi-sweet, flavour of sweet fruits, pine and grapefruit.
Palate: medium body, smooth texture, medium carbonation.
Overall: Decent one

Moja miłość do Craftu rosła powoli i systematycznie w miarę picia coraz to innych zacnych trunków. Kilka jednak piw stanowiło "kamienie milowe". Pojawiały się one w różnych momentach mojej piwnej wiedzy i doświadczenia, pozostawiając w szoku " jak te piwa potrafią być różne od najpopularniejszych sklepówek i jak potrafią się różnić między sobą.." Mój dzisiejszy "gość" jednym z tych kamieni milowych był. A wszystko zaczęło się od przyłożenia nosa do szyjki butelki i potężnej dawki tropików, cytrusów i chmielów których próżno szukać między fostersami, carlingami i heinekenami... 

PUNK IPA już na wstępie ma u mnie plus, że jest niezwykle dostępny i obok Guinessa jest jednym z podchodzących mi piw, na które mogę trafić w zwyczajnych nie - kraftowych angielskich pubach. 

Ciekawy jestem jak wypadnie flagowiec BREW DOGA, kiedy znacznie mądrzejszy w piwne doświadczenia rozbiorę go na czynniki pierwsze.

Aromat: Tutaj niewiele się zmienia. Już od momentu otwarcia z szyjki butelki dochodzi przyjemna woń. Choć kilka piw tego stylu obezwładniło mnie już mocniej swoim aromatem, to właśnie zapach PUNK'a do końca życia będzie dla mnie wyznacznikiem tego jak pachnie porządna IPA. Są tu zatem cytrusy, tropiki, mango, ananas. Majaczą mi tu chyba też mandarynki. Jest tu słodko i intensywnie. 

Wygląd: złoty kolor, piwo z niewielką szybko opadającą pianą, lacing znikomy zostaje w minimalny stopniu na szkle. Po wierzchu piwa nie pływa nawet obłoczek piany. 

Smak: Pierwsza idzie goryczka, średnio intensywna, dla mnie odpowiednia dla tego stylu piwa :) Przełamuje się w owoce tropikalne. Są tu akcenty, które rozróżniają to piwo od większości IPA jakie do tej pory piłem. Być może to te nowozelandzkie chmiele? W składzie nie wyczytuję też niezmiernie popularnej aktualnie Citry. 

Wrażenia: Średnie ciało i wysycenie. Alko w odpowiedniej proporcji. Wysoka pijalność 

Podsumowanie:
Punk IPA stanowi i zapewne będzie stanowić dla mnie doskonałe rozwiązanie na grilla do "zwykłego pubu", do obiadu, na "warm up". Klasyka gatunku i ekonomiczny wybór.
Golden color, foamy, with grapefruit aroma.   Hoppy, citrus flavor that finishes crisp.

Orange-golden color with a thin, white head of medium retention. Very hoppy and fresh aroma, freshly-cut grass and notes of flowers. Light and similar taste, with low bitterness but very refreshing, some resinous note backed by a medium bitterness at the end. Medium-light body, watery texture and nice carbonation. Very good to drink in large quantities, refreshing and an easy introduction to IPAs, although it lacks some complexity and flavors.

DATE: September 13, 2018... OCCASION: having returned from our first middle school Back to School Night, time for some Office and a solid ale... GLASSWARE: Stoudts pint... the second Brewdog I had pours a light orange amber body, crystal clear with a steady stream of small white bubbles, which builds a two-fingered off-white head...that head unevenly forms waves around the glass and a hazy central smear... hard, well-toasted caramel weds with a nice underpinning of orange and lemon citrus... its lengthy list of hops blesses it with a heightened floral aroma.... an oily, smooth, lightly textured body that goes down as easily as its ABV suggests... this gets crunchier as it sips--but it never reaches a weight that halts the next sip... sweet, sharp hops create a fruity, punchy combination of grapefruit, mango, and lemon, with caramel dominating the profile.... a friendly pub ale that does has a flavor profile commensurate with its weight... not as overwhelming in its citrus as it claims to be on its can, though...
This hoppy and fresh IPA is probably the best IPA I have ever had! its stunning how perfect the hoppy aroma comes through. Love it

This is my favourite, go to beer. If I see it on draught I always have to go for a pint. It's very consistent tasting in cans and bottles, I find in places like Wetherspoons in can be a bit hit and miss on the draught but generally it's always at least an 8/10 for me.

If you haven't tried it yet, go for it!
I love this beer its fruity but not too much, light with a balanced aroma and a nice feel.

You've lived in a cave if the only reason you've brought this beer is off the back of the adverts cropping up all over London at the moment. It's a top drawer IPA which is now widely available, and yes BrewDog are capitalising on the lack of mass produced decent IPAs available but who cares? It's still a lovely strong beer with a punchy nose and aftertaste. Always better on top I believe.

Recently purchased this based on the "ratebeer" adverts in London, actually the beer is pretty poor, mediocre at best. Aroma reminds me of what can only be describes as "what's left in the driptray of a craft beer bar". Appearance is pretty good actually, they seem to have good clarity, taste is just over-the-top and the only explosion this one will get is when I return it back to the bar staff for the extortionate price. Palate wise, i'd recommend pairing this with another beer straight away afterwards, as in reality you'll need something to clear it through.
Smells horrible, tastes horrible. Hard to fathom how they sell this for such high prices. Seems to be drunk by followers. If you want proof marketing works look no further.
12oz can. A classic IPA. Doesn't have that over the top hop feel, but does have a great depth and balance. Easy drinking, filtered. Good.

Un subtil équilibre fruité et amer qui ravira tous les palais.
Not sure what everyone's problem is, it tastes great, the package is great and it's not too high in alcohol. Only a 5.6%. Great job, Brewdog.
Great beer, strong and powerful taste, but beware of having too many. Seems needlessly high ABV @ 5.6%
Got a great fresh pint 3 days old! Very tropical hoppy IPA. Strong bitter taste with the fresh tropical citrus. Love this beer!
Flavour too strong and hard to drink. I can taste the alcohol in it, much better IPAs available

Pours a clear golden with a white foam head. Aroma is tropical fruits, floral, and resin hops. Flavor is dominated by floral and resin notes, with some fruit. Has some carbonation and some bitterness. This is decent. It doesn't stand out, but it's drinkable.

Can sampled in a glass, 
this IPA was a light medium orange-gold in the glass, the beer had a hint of haze, there was a small white cover that did not last long,  
this ale had aromas of orange and grapefruit citrus hops, hops had a bit of pine and herb, some toasted malt, a little bread, 
malt and bread sweetness, 
the flavors were similar to the nose, citrus hops, light toasted malt, bread, 
some malt and fruit sweetness, 
a light to less than medium hop bitterness in the finish, 
the mouth feel was light and there was soft to average carbonation, 
I thought it was a weak IPA, so-so drink.

Color amarillo anaranjado con cierta turbidez, buena espuma con retención media.  Aromo cítrico y tropical, nada desmesurado, lo justo, gusto en la misma linea, un poco de resina, dulce, medicinal, jarabe, bastante artifical, le falta amargor. Mi relación con esta cerveza es amor/odio, me voló la tapa de los sesos en su día y cada vez es más floja, mi paladar ha evolucionado, pero esta no es la cerveza resinosa y canábica q me enamoró, ni de coña. En los pubs oficiales de Brewdog aún se puede degustar algo parecido al producto que en su día fue artesanal, y de lata está mejor que en botella, pero aquella Punk Ipa mágica que cambió la historia de la cerveza ya no existe.

L’une des meilleures IPA sur le marché de la grande consommation, la meilleure probablement. Couleur, robe et tenue excellente, la mousse est gazéifiée parfaitement. L’amertume est précise et suffisante, les houblons apportent d’innombrables saveurs sèches, mais pas trop, conservant le caractère désaltérant de la punk. Une excellente bière

Ipa notevolmente bilanciata, un amaro mai eccessivo ma nemmeno carente che persiste il giusto, buona secchezza e molto gradevole l'insieme di note erbacee ed agrumate (meno intense che in altre ipa od apa, ma non di certo "deboli", il che potrebbe anche costituire un pregio) che caratterizzano abbastanza similmente aroma e gusto, schiuma media ed abbastanza persistente. Rientra senza ombra di dubbio nella categoria delle "pericolosamente beverine".

Full of flavour and aroma on your palate really fruity but when it goes down leaves a bitter taste can leave you leaving thirsty 5.6% not bad and gives u a nice "feeling" on a light stomach not an everlasting love with this one, ..but definitely not the full Monty lacks volume probably brewed to fast..
Bière IPA parfaite ! Pas agressive , saveur agrume délicat et subtil. Teneur en alcool idéal pour une bière de cette catégorie.

La PunkIPA non ha bisogno di presentazioni. All’aspetto color miele tendente all’arancio, profumatissima con sentori di agrumi, al gusto si sentono gusti di frutta tropicale facilmente distinguibile l’ananas. Non troppo amara ma molto persistente.

Living legend! Perfect beer for these who just start their adventure with 'beer revolution' craft beers and safe and thrustworthy choice for the more experienced connoisseurs.
   Not so dark golden colour, medium-lasting fine and medium-bubbly foam.
   On the nose aromas not very intense(mostly citrus, a little bit hoppy, very delicate herbal hint). 
   Tasting notes from the other hand very clear. Mostly grapefruit and mango but also delicate traces of peach and even banana! Malt almost imperceptible comparing to traditional english ales- some malt(caramel) notes which make it perfectly balanced!
   Very drinkable and refreshing. With moderate medium-bitter  hoppy aftertaste. This not so intense bitterness distinguishes Punk IPA from other craft ales and that's why it's a perfect match for beginners. Also because of its wide availability.

In all honesty, one of the best ipas I have ever had. I genuinely love it. Hoppy, citrus, floral punch with a distinctive taste. It truly is a 
benchmarker in quality.

Très bonne bière ecossaise, goûté lors du Hellfest et bu en quantité....du coup acheté a Carrefour la Pioline pour l'apprecier en privé....vraiment très bonne.... fruité et pas trop forte un bon goût de houblon comme on aime😁
Orange-gold pour, small white head. Floral and honeysuckle aroma. Flavor is floral, with caramel and light grassiness. A bit thin.

Really nicely balanced. There is a nice citrus component that really stands out. Mildly bitter with more resin and citrus zest than floral hops. Smooth and full, but not heavy. A really great all-around IPA.
Fresh OH can. Hop blend is broad and creative. Finish was not as bitter as I expected. $1.99/12 ounce can is regionally competitive.

An orange like color with a small head. Aromas of hops, citrus and exotic fruits. Taste balanced with a nice bitter finish, which could be more strong. Medium to full body with a medium carbonation. Overall a very nice refreshing and aromatic IPA with medium bitterness.
Délicieuse et rafraîchissante. Fort goût de houblon accompagné d’agrumes. Disponible dans la plus part des supermarchés en France.

Аромат не сильный и не мощный, немного сухого американского хмеля, елки, совсем немного фруктового оттенка. Пены практически нету, цвет темно оранжевый. Вкус в меру горький, весьма сильно по началу отдает апельсином и грейпфрутом. Далее идет елочная горечь, но не сильная и быстрая. Послевкусие очень пустоватое, преимущественно солодовое. В целом культовая ипа оказалась не культовая для меня по вкусу.

Złote, przejrzyste, ze średnio i drobnopęcherzykową pianą. Aromat ciekawie zbalansowany między karmelem, a owocami tropikalnymi. W smaku bardzo ale-owe, słodowe. Nie jest przesadzone w żadną stronę i to jest jego największy atut. Fajnie zbalansowane i ułożone, że średnią goryczką. Jest trochę ciała, niskie nasycenie, dobrze się pije.
Tretinka z Tesca. No dobre, ikona všetkých IPA štýlov, tak som sipovedal, že vyskúšam. Je trošku iná ako najlepšie slovenské IPA, ale nie horšia ani lepšia. Pekný zážitok.
Увидели Punk, берите сразу! Великолепный баланс аромата, вкуса и тела. Можно смело называть это пиво классикой.
Originally rated using the RateBeer application on my phone.  For some reason errors erased my notes and made it a tick.  I no longer have the reference notes.
Nice beer. Grapefruit flavour counterbalanced with nice bitterness. Not too hoppy but enough to keep it interesting.

Une belle découverte. Une forte amertume contrebalancée par des notes florales issues d'un dry hopping bien maîtrisé. Que dire si ce n'est que cette bière est un vrai délice et une expérience fantastique. Le final vous explose dans la bouche, une vraie découverte, une vraie merveille. Bravo aux écossais qui ont su allier tradition et modernité.
Tried for the first time last night, I don't normally touch beer in a can but this is really nice, not as hoppy as some ipa's which really suits me!! Loved it!

Can pours clear gold with huge fluffy white head and lacing. Aroma: citrus and tropical fruits, both very fragrant, honey. Flavor: lush mango, pineapple, orange, cantaloupe, honey and pine. Mouthfeel: medium-bodied.

Barwa zlota, piana szybko sie redukuje do obraczki zdobiacej szklo.
Aromat cytusowo- iglasty.
Smak lekko cytrusowy.  Dosc wodnisty. Nie zasmakowala mi ta butelka. Data do 25/06/2019. Moze to kwestia wypicia 2 innych piw przed tym wlasnie.
Good appearance. Subtle in aroma, taste and aftertaste. Well balanced. Bitterness just right for me.

Light yellow color with a white head.
Nice sweet IPA. Medium hop flavor and a nicely balanced bitterness.
Nice beer, grapefruity and a pleasant bitterness😄 Good for social drinking but as a 5.6% it is quite strong so go slow

Botella de 33cl en Santiago, de grifo en varias cervecerías y pinta en uno de sus brewpub de Londres. Desde luego, la del brewpub le da mil vueltas, prueba de que hay que beberla muy fresca. 

Muy clara. Color dorado ligero. Cuerpo ligeramente oleoso.

Aroma suavemente lupulado con toques a pino y cítrico.

Carbonatacion media con poca retención de cabeza.

Amargor ligero. Retrogusto a malta.

Session IPA recomendable para iniciarse.

Lekkere IPA maar iets te flauw om een verpletterende indruk te maken. Zoals vaak met de ipa uit usa

lekkere IPA, allen iets te zoet en qua geur en smaak vrij normaal.
De moeite waard voor mensen die niet bekend zijn met dit type bier.

Piana średnio obfita, puszysta, trwała.
Aromat wyraźny, owocowy, cytrusowy. Trochę tropików i lekkie nuty żywiczne.
W smaku podobnie, wyraźna żywica i cytrusy. Przyjemny goryczkowy finisz.
Brewdogin klassikko. Kaiken kaikkiaan nautittava kokemus kesäsäällä. Ei täydellinen, mutta erittäin mielellään kaivan kaapista.
Nagyon finom! Egy nyári estén kiváló választás lehet! Egy jó sör! Se több se kevesebb!

Pour moi la meilleure des IPA disponible en grande surface. Arômes d'agrumes dominants grâce au Chinook et au cascade. Ce standard d'houblonnage qu'on retrouvé dans la majorité des IPA du commerce  fait que je m'en lasse un peu. Mais la Punk IPA reste au dessus des autres grâce aux houblons supplémentaires qui donnent de variété des les notes persistantes en bouche. IPA relativement classique mais avec un plus

Draught, Pint, 500 ml. The Brewdog's classic, and the first beer as well. James Watt who is a co-founder of BrewDog wrote a book entitled 'Business for Punks' - a book about how to bulid up business in a BrewDog way. I guess the first and most important thing is to make smthg quality stuff like the Punk IPA. A deep golden, medium bodied IPA with good, almways persistent thin white foam on top. Grapefruit, nectarine, orange and some sweetness (or rather lightly caramelistic) background. Medium- carbo, great fruity palate with a pleasent bitterness. IBU around 45-50 i guess (i've checked, it's just 35), aftertaste is grapefruity and quite long. Nice job, a nice beer for not just for punks.
Mai bevuta ad oggi. Piacevole scoperta. Ottima IPA. carbonazione equilibrata. Voto personale 9.8/100

- Citrus and hops aroma.
- Taste of grapefruit, bitter sweet.
Medium body. Low carbonation.

26 June 2018. Sample at 't Taphuys, Tilburg. Shared with Anke.
Clear dark golden with a big, foamy, white head; lots of lacing. Fresh aroma of grapefruit, mango, lime juice, pineapple, spruce, bready malt, pine & resin. It tastes medium fruity sweet, hints of mango & lime, and light to medium hoppy bitter, pine & spruce note. Dryish, piny hoppy finish, bit bready & spicy, lingering fruity hoppiness. Medium body, slick/oily texture, soft carbonation. Good brew, quaffable, as expected.
Piwo wypite przed założeniem konta na RateBeer. Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji.

Unless I got a bad 4 pack this was the worst       'beer' I have tasted in 40 years. 

The only thing I can liken it's taste to is yatch varnish. Really unpleasant. The few beers I have not liked in my life I have finished and made a note not to have again but this was so awful it went down the sink.

Not fit for purpose.

Wow, écht een topper.  Bij dit warme goudkleurige bier in supermooi flesje knalt de smaak van het tropisch fruit je glas uit. Mango, ananas, grapefruit, lychee en nog veel meer. In de afdronk echte IPA

What was once something of a newcomer has quickly become a popular classic. 

Fantastic IPA, full of citrus and VERY palatable. 

If I were to have a criticism, it would be that it can become a little too much after a few of them, and is very easy to overindulge in... but is that really a bad thing? 

Thoroughly recommend.
Příjemná, silněji nachmelená ipa s klasickými tóny tohoto stylu. Příjemně potěšila. Degustace U Dvou dobráků.
Hoppy, citrusy, touch of caramel, earthy. Decent carbonation. Very nice beer.
Decent beer. 33cl straight from bottle. Taste of citrus and hops. Aroma has touch of citrus to it.

En copa, color dorado con una generosa capa de espuma. Aroma sencillamente brutal: frutas tropicales, flores, hierba fresca y alguna fruta cítrica. En boca, toques cítricos y frutales algo dulzones, ligera presencia de cereal muy poco tostado y una nota muy suave de levadura. Algo de amargor al final del trago en garganta, quizás demasiado suave para una IPA. Una cerveza generosamente aromática, y a la vez suave e ideal para iniciarse en este estilo.

I was a bit sceptic by her looks in the glass until I took my first zip. It felt uniquely cool and soft, in a good way of course. Bitter-sweet neck and when it comes to the body it makes you want to keep going! Now I feel bad that I only have one bottle.

Appearance -> Dark yellow/orange.

Can from an off license in Kenmare. Golden pour, finger of white fluff. Nose is melons and tropical. Middle is medium body malt, grapefruit, and pine. Finish is medium bitterness. Balanced, drinkable beer.

Birra che a Roma è ormai molto commercializzata e il giudizio che uno può farsene è facilmente deviato dal fatto che troppo spesso le bottiglie sono vecchie e/o mal conservate. Invece, se in forma, è un'Ipa niente male
Can - pours gold white head. Nose and taste of alcohol, pine, caramel malt and grapefruit peel - medium body

Punk IPA pours a pale amber to light orange color and its head is frothy and of medium-long lifetime. The nose is filled with pine and intense fruity nectarine, peach, green mango, and citrus notes. The flavor opens with semi-dry nutty malts, while the hops take their time to unfold their crisp peach, citrus, and light floral notes. The bitterness slowly but steadily increases after the initially aromatic mid-palate and stays with the pleasantly grippy finish along with white pepper spiciness, while hazelnut and alcohol notes quietly resonate. Never mind the bollocks, here’s BrewDog.

Love this IPA, still one of the first craft IPAs I’ve tasted. I know many people think there are better, but with the right glass, the right temperature, nothing much beats it, fruity aroma,  smooth and delicious.

500ml can got @ Amstein Veyre Switzerland drink @ 05.29.18 Clarens Switzerland BBF 04.10.19
外观 琥珀色透明清亮酒身 两指白色颗粒泡沫表面极其绵密 持续时间相对较久
香气 焦糖 蜂蜜 葡萄柚

50 cl. bottle at home. High fluffy lasting white head. Clear yellow golden body. Sweet straw honey aroma. Heavily carbonated relatively hoppy flavor with straw and notes of lemon. Long dry and bitter finish.
Tap at Anchor Hotel, Horsham. Clear golden yellow with moderate head. Moderate carb. Straight hoppiness with pretty mild finish. Not exactly punk but there you go
